title.rendered: One month later, we’ve coded our first apps!

content.rendered:
We reached a first milestone — successfully coding our own fully functioning, attractive, web deployed apps. 

When we started a month ago, nobody from our first Code the Dream class had ever coded even the simplest app. In fact, most of us had never even written our first line of code. But after a lot of hard work and the help of an amazing team of mentors, we’ve got apps!
